original_title: Carlos Alcaraz wins first Cincinnati Open title as Jannik Sinner retires with illness | CNN
article_summary: Carlos Alcaraz wins Cincinnati Open as Jannik Sinner retires due to illness, securing his sixth ATP title this year and avenging his loss to Sinner at Wimbledon. Sinner's retirement ends his 26-match winning streak on hard courts and denies him back-to-back Cincinnati titles.</s>
